attributes.action: Acknowledgement of babies stillborn between 16 and 23 weeks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a mommy, noone can tell me any different.
I had my baby at 20 weeks gestation on 4th July 2006, that baby is my daughter Shannon. 
Unfortunatley I went into early labour and she was still born. Although Shannon was born so prematurley she was perfect in every way. She had all her features, toes, fingers, nails etc.
I was treated badly by the hospital staff, they told me i had a miscarriage and my baby has no certificates to say she was here. only a grave at a cemetary.
To me a miscarriage you have before the stage where you give birth, not when you hold and see your fully grown baby.
I wish for all babies still born between 16 and 23 weeks to be acknowledged in some way. Please sign this petition even if this has not happened to you.
